root: ^You approach a familiar man in a top hat, with rosy cheeks and thin, stitched lips. Golden strings hang limply from his limbs, like a discarded marionette. He is turned away from you, but there is recognition in his still-seeing eyes.
^??:...What a bitter state of affairs we find ourselves in.

c-0: ^The familiar man gives a tasteless, empty chuckle.
^Mayor: Regrettably so, I fear. It brings some small joy that your memory hasn’t rotted like your form.
^Mayor: Still, I doubt I am the only one who harbors such remorse.
^Mayor: You must have questions. Ask away.
c-1: ^The familiar man breathes deep through his nose, unbothered by the scent of death.
^Mayor: You are not alone in fault, friend. Far from it.
^Mayor: Fear and complacency go hand in hand, after all.
^Mayor: You must have questions. Ask away.

questions: ^What happened to the rest of the church?

c-0: ^Mayor: ...I fled. ^Forlorn, the man’s posture visibly sinks. ^Mayor: I hold no deeper shame. I knew that… thing… that something was coming,, and I turned my back on those I purported service to. ^Mayor: Atonement may never grace me for such deep cowardice.
c-1: ^Mayor: Perhaps the only good to have come from the Convergence after all this time.-
c-2: ^Mayor: Much has come about since the Convergence. ^Mayor: Be it fate, people have entrusted me with leading them once more. And I will see to it they are safe.
c-3: ^Mayor: You always possessed an acute poise. Perhaps it will bless you with the chance to right these wrongs of ours

c-0: ^Mayor: Evidently, I do recognize you. Yes, you were quite the illustrious devotee to the church then.… ^After a moment of silence, the man leans in to regard your appearance in greater detail. ^Mayor: Not many with our strain of history return to this hellish place.
c-1: ^Mayor: I do not know, perhaps I could have. ^Mayor: The church had exploited my likeness. Leaving me nothing but a puppet to their dissolute cause. ^A deep sigh can be heard from the man, seeming to be lost in thought. ^Mayor: Still, I am not exempt from fault..
